title: South to Northern maquiladoras migration in Mexico

content.question: Which of the following best describes internal migration in Mexico since 2010 ?

choices.label: There has been a large movement of people from urban to rural areas.
People from the south often move to the north to work in maquiladora zones.
Ethnic minority groups are given economic incentives to move to the west.
Highly skilled workers are moving to the east coast for high-tech jobs.

content.answer: People from the south often move to the north to work in maquiladora zones.
